mapper.select: select id id,name name,other_name other_name,score score,is_delete is_delete,is_trouble is_trouble,url url,icon_url icon_url,zhiji_rank zhiji_rank, zhijia_url zhijia_url,zhijia_code zhijia_code,tianyan_rank tianyan_rank,tianyan_code tianyan_code,tianyan_level tianyan_level ,luopan_code luopan_code,luopan_rank luopan_rank, remark remark ,tianyan_url tianyan_url,rank360 rank360,rank360_int rank360_int,gentou_rank gentou_rank,rate3_return rate3_return,rate6_return rate6_return,is_love is_love from t_plat ORDER BY score DESC

select id id,name name,other_name other_name,score score,is_delete is_delete,is_trouble is_trouble,url url,icon_url icon_url,zhiji_rank zhiji_rank, zhijia_url zhijia_url,zhijia_code zhijia_code,tianyan_rank tianyan_rank,tianyan_code tianyan_code,tianyan_level tianyan_level,remark remark ,luopan_code luopan_code,luopan_rank luopan_rank,tianyan_url tianyan_url,rank360 rank360,rank360_int rank360_int,gentou_rank gentou_rank,rate3_return rate3_return,rate6_return rate6_return,is_love is_love from t_plat ${str}

select id id,name name,other_name other_name,score score,is_delete is_delete,is_trouble is_trouble,url url,icon_url icon_url,zhiji_rank zhiji_rank, zhijia_url zhijia_url,zhijia_code zhijia_code,tianyan_rank tianyan_rank,tianyan_code tianyan_code,tianyan_level tianyan_level,remark remark ,luopan_code luopan_code,luopan_rank luopan_rank,rate3_return rate3_return,rate6_return rate6_return,is_love is_love ,tianyan_url tianyan_url,rank360 rank360,rank360_int rank360_int,gentou_rank gentou_rank from t_plat where id=#{id}
mapper.update: update t_plat set rate3_return=#{rate3_return} where id=#{id}
update t_plat set rate6_return=#{rate6_return} where id=#{id}
update t_plat set score=#{score} where id=#{id}
update t_plat set gentou_rank=#{gentou_rank} where name=#{name} or other_name=#{name}
update t_plat set rank360=#{rank360},rank360_int=#{rank360_int} where name=#{name} or other_name=#{name}
update t_plat set zhiji_rank=#{zhiji_rank} where name=#{name} or other_name=#{name}
update t_plat set tianyan_level=#{tianyan_level},tianyan_rank=#{tianyan_rank} where name=#{name} or other_name=#{name}
update t_plat set zhijia_code=#{zhijia_code},icon_url=#{zhijia_url} where name=#{name} or other_name=#{name}
update t_plat set tianyan_code=#{tianyan_code},url=#{url} where name=#{name} or other_name=#{name}
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from t_plat_rank_thirdparty
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into t_plat_rank_thirdparty (id, name, question, author, url) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{question,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into t_plat_rank_thirdparty
id,
name,
question,
author,
url,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{question,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update t_plat_rank_thirdparty
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
question = #{record.question,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
author = #{record.author,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
url = #{record.url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update t_plat_rank_thirdparty set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, question = #{record.question,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, author = #{record.author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{record.url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_plat_rank_thirdparty
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
question = #{question,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
